data.message: Great. Now how are you going to FIX your broken messenger? Every time I click on it to answer messages on my phone. I keep getting kicked over to installing the Facebook Messenger App. I DON'T WANT THE APP!!! I want to answer and check my messages the normal way. How do I do that? And don't say that I can't. I use to. FIX IT!

replies.message: We're sorry you feel that way, Brian. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2oMoFc9. -Krista
I did. Thank you automated messaging. NOT!
